actionConfiguration.body:
select 
request_id,
ret.retailer_code,
ret.area_zone,
ret.retailer_name,
wgt.retailer_contacts,
asm_name,
(select contact from agent where upper(agent_email)=upper(asm_name)) as asm_contact,
sales_name,
a.contact as sales_contact,
group_request_status,
to_char(wgt.created_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as Created_time,
wgt.created_by,
to_char(wgt.updated_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as updated_time,
wgt.updated_by,
wgt.agent_id,
wgt.remarks
from whatsapp_group_request wgt
left join retailer ret on ret.retailer_code=wgt.retailer_code
left join agent a on wgt.created_by=a.agent_email
where
to_char(created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000') >=
to_char(date({{whatsapp_from_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000')
and  
to_char(created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd 23:59:999')<=
to_char(date({{whatsapp_to_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 23:59:999')
AND 
(case when coalesce({{whatsapp_retailer_code.text}},'')='' then 1=1 else upper(wgt.retailer_code)=upper(coalesce({{whatsapp_retailer_code.text}},'')) end)
order by request_id desc;
